item.title: Schools
item.description: In this as yet unnamed universe, there 3 of schools magic. They are as follows: Origination - or “Origin” for short, creative magic Suppression - or “Quell” for short, destructive magic Transformation - or “Tweak” for short, manipulative magic Each kind of magic follows some rules of conservation of energy, mass, or magic, but depend on the introduction of two realms or states of being so that any kind of energy, mass or other material property can exist in either realm and has a sort of parallel void in the inverse realm.
